choices.name: Capability_Statement
choices.choiceText: Capability Statement (Basic high level proposal detailing product / solution capabilities)

choices.name: Formal_Bid
choices.choiceText: Formal Bid (Formal bidding process such as an RFP, RFT, RFI, RFQ, EOI)

choices.name: Proposal_Pro_active
choices.choiceText: Proactive Proposal (Detailed proposal tailored to customer requirements)

choices.name: Support_Request
choices.choiceText: Support Request (General support request or additional support for bid / proposal already submitted)

Flow.label: BidsRequest

fields.name: FormalBidDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Please provide details about the Formal Bid you need supported by completing the form - press Next to submit your request

fields.name: OpptyName1
Is_this_an_existing_customer_or_renewal_of_existing_business
fields.fieldText: Does this bid relate to the Renewal of existing work or New Business?

fields.name: New_Were_you_aware_of_the_bid_opportunity_before_it_was_released
fields.fieldText: Were you aware of the bid opportunity before it was released?

fields.name: Estimated_value_of_opportunity_per_annum
fields.fieldText: Estimated value of opportunity per annum

fields.name: New_Will_you_require_support_from_the_EC_G_Solutions_team
fields.fieldText: Will you require support from the EC & G Solutions team?

fields.name: New_Are_third_party_partners_required_to_deliver_services
fields.fieldText: Are third party partners required to deliver services?

fields.name: New_Product_Solutions_type
fields.fieldText: Are the product / solutions standard 'off-the-shelf' or do we have to build / customise them?

fields.fieldText: Please provide details about the Formal Bid you need supported by completing the form - press Next to submit your request

Is_this_an_existing_customer_or_renewal_of_existing_business_0
fields.fieldText: Does this bid relate to the Renewal of existing work or New Business?

fields.fieldText: Were you aware of the bid opportunity before it was released?

fields.name: Estimated_value_of_opportunity_per_annum_0
fields.fieldText: Estimated value of opportunity per annum

fields.name: typeOfBidActivity
fields.fieldText: Please select the type of activity that you would like the Bids & Tenders team to support – then press Next.

fields.name: Activity_Type
fields.helpText: Select the type of bid activity so that your bid support request may be directed to the correct representative.

fields.name: Information2
fields.fieldText:
You have not made a valid selection for one or more of these fields
* Document Type
* Primary Product
Click Next to be taken to the previous screen to confirm your selections.

fields.name: Finish
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for submitting a Bid Support Request – your reference number is {!varBidRequestRefNum}
The Bids & Tenders team will respond to your request within 1 business day.
Press Finish to return to the Opportunity.

screens.name: No_Assessment_Request_Basic_Request_Form
screens.label: No Assessment Request - Basic Request Form

fields.name: Description_of_Work_Requested
fields.helpText: Enter any comments or instructions that you may have for the bids team.

fields.name: WelcomeMessage
fields.fieldText:
You can use this form to request support from the Bids & Tenders team for all Formal Bids or proposals for any Australia Post, StarTrack or Decipha product.
From the drop down menu below, please select the Sales team that you belong to then press Next

screens.name: Please_select_values
screens.label: Please ensure you have selected values

fields.name: Information
fields.fieldText:
You have not made a valid selection for one or more of these fields
* Document Type
* Primary Product
* Were you aware of the bid opportunity before it was released?
* Does this bid relate to the Renewal of existing work or New Business?
* Will you require support from the EC & G Solutions team?
* Are third party partners required to deliver services?
* Are the product / solutions standard 'off-the-shelf' or do we have to build / customise them?
Click Next to be taken to the previous screen to confirm your selections.

screens.name: Please_select_values_0
screens.label: Please ensure you have selected values
